summary: This module implements the conversion logic that maps OpenAI-style embedding requests and responses to the format required by Amazon Bedrock's Cohere embedding service, encapsulated in a configuration class that detects model versions, builds request payloads, and translates parameters.
business_intent: Allow applications written for the OpenAI embeddings API to seamlessly utilize Cohere embedding models hosted on Amazon Bedrock, reducing integration effort and ensuring correct request/response handling.
